officialTitle: A Randomized Clinical Trial of Single Dose Liposomal Bupivacaine Delivered Via VATS Intercostal Nerve Block vs. Continuous Bupivacaine Infusion Delivered Via Indwelling Subscapular Catheter After Surgical Stabilization of Rib Fractures
inclusionCriteria:
* Patients undergoing SSRF at Denver Health Medical Center
* Must have minimum age of 18 Years
exclusionCriteria:
* Allergy or hypersensitivity to bupivacaine
* Pregnancy
* Incarceration
* Age \< 18 years
* Indwelling continuous thoracic epidural analgesia
